content: संसरणं {@--1@} Going, proceeding, revolution. {@--2@} The world, wordly life, mundane existence, ग्रीष्मचंडकरमंडलभीष्मज्वालसंसरणतापितमूर्तेः <ls>Bv. 4. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Birth and re-birth. {@--4@} The unresisted march of troops. {@--5@} The commencement of battle. {@--6@} A highway. {@--7@} A resting-place for passengers near the gates of a city.
